Name: Gears of War 3: Limited Collector's Edition
Overview:
Gears of War 3 is a 2011 military science fiction third-person shooter video game developed by Epic Games and published by Microsoft Studios for the Xbox 360. Originally due for release on April 5, 2011, the game was delayed and eventually released on September 20, 2011.

Gears of War 3 made over one million pre-orders. It is the third installment of the Gears of War series. The story was written by science fiction author Karen Traviss. A sequel titled Gears of War 4 was announced in June 2015 and will be released in 2016.

This Limited Edition includes:

Gears of War 3
fabric COG flag
Octus Service medal
Octus Award box
Adam Fenix multiplayer skin
personal items of Adam Fenix, including his last will and testament and the Hammer of Dawn schematics
